mapper.select: SELECT * FROM entry_sel_master WHERE TERM_DIV LIKE #{termDiv} AND COURSE_DIV LIKE #{courseDiv}
SELECT * FROM entry_sel_master WHERE TERM_DIV LIKE #{termDiv} AND COURSE_DIV LIKE #{courseDiv} AND RCRT_NO LIKE #{rcrtNo}

SELECT eam.*, ROUND((eet.EV1_SCORE+eet.EV2_SCORE+eet.EV3_SCORE)/3 , 1) AS EV_AVG_SCORE, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND((eet.EV1_SCORE+eet.EV2_SCORE+eet.EV3_SCORE)/3 , 1) DESC) AS PREL_ORD FROM entry_apply_master eam, entry_ev_target eet WHERE eam.APLY_NO = eet.APLY_NO AND eam.RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND eam.DOC_PASS_YN = 'Y'

SELECT eam.*, ROUND((eet.EV1_SCORE+eet.EV2_SCORE+eet.EV3_SCORE)/3 , 1) AS EV_AVG_SCORE, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND((eet.EV1_SCORE+eet.EV2_SCORE+eet.EV3_SCORE)/3 , 1) DESC) AS PREL_ORD FROM entry_apply_master eam, entry_ev_target eet WHERE eam.RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND eam.APLY_NO = eet.APLY_NO AND eam.DOC_PASS_YN = 'Y' AND eam.FNL_PASS_YN = 'Y';
mapper.update: UPDATE entry_apply_master SET DOC_PASS_YN = #{docPassYn} WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
UPDATE entry_apply_master SET FNL_PASS_YN = #{fnlPassYn} WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM entry_ev_target WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_ev_target(APLY_NO, RCRT_NO, EV1_SCORE, EV2_SCORE, EV3_SCORE, RSLT_DIV) VALUE (#{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, 0, 0, 0, '면접전형')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM entry_ev_target WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
